info:Stayed in June 2023
info:Family
info:15 Reviews
rating:3.7
posted:Posted July 8, 2023
msg:The decoration of the hotel is very luxurious, and the design is also thoughtful. The rooms also have many humanized designs, which is very good.
The front desk concierge and room service are very nice, and it makes people very happy when they check in.
But food is so-so. The waiters in the restaurant are lazy, and they are very slow to order a set of tableware, and the attitude of the chef at the noodle stall is not very good. When it was time to collect the food, the service staff, like the Flash, quickly removed all the food. For this reason, some elderly customers had conflicts with the waiter. When this happened, the waiter still did not hesitate Stopping there to collect things, this service experience is relatively poor.

Secondly, as a five-star hotel, the bath water in this hotel is very small, and it takes more than half an hour to put a tank of bath water, which is a poor experience.

Finally, as the last stop of the whole journey, I would like to say that Urumqi's initiative and requirements for indoor smoking bans are a complete failure. Many years ago, Urumqi City implemented the indoor smoking ban along with the whole country, but as far as I can tell from the whole trip, no one is obeying it at all. We asked for a non-smoking room, but actually it smelled like smoke even though the room was cleaned. We were at the front desk of the hotel swimming pool, in a very narrow reception area. Because there were children around, we met a man who smoked. After persuading him not to smoke, he was chased and scolded by him. This experience was also relatively poor.
I always hope that the great beauty of Xinjiang will get better and better, and the motherland will prosper.

The surrounding environment is very good, Wanda Plaza is right next to it, and shopping and eating are also very convenient. The room is clean, tidy and quiet. We stayed for two nights this time and had a good rest. The overall decoration of the hotel also has Xinjiang characteristics. There are many special handicrafts in the lobby that can be photographed. Overall, I am very satisfied, it is worth recommending, and I will choose it again if I have the opportunity!
